channel.title: [317]NPC's - DemisePK base[317]
channel.description:
Alright, so, I'm doing a GodWars addition to Demise's 317, and theirs a problem with the NPC's.
1.) The NPC's all face the same direction, regardless of what I change in the Autospawn.CFG, they face the same direction.
2.) I can't get the NPC's to move. I added a ::spawn command that automatically adds the NPC to the Autospawn.CFG, and if I add an NPC via the ::spawn command, they move around just fine (the ::spawn automatically sets a random path for the NPC to walk.) However, when I restart the server, the same NPC that WAS moving, is now frozen in place. So I'm inclined to think the NPC's are "frozen" at startup, but I need help un-freezing them.
- Thanks in advance Sideways_8

item.title: [317]NPC's - DemisePK base[317]
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

search in client.java for something like npc movement. If that doesnt work i got no idea

Read full topic

item.title: [317]NPC's - DemisePK base[317]
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

Alright, so, I’m doing a GodWars addition to Demise’s 317, and theirs a problem with the NPC’s.

1.) The NPC’s all face the same direction, regardless of what I change in the Autospawn.CFG, they face the same direction.

2.) I can’t get the NPC’s to move. I added a ::spawn command that automatically adds the NPC to the Autospawn.CFG, and if I add an NPC via the ::spawn command, they move around just fine (the ::spawn automatically sets a random path for the NPC to walk.) However, when I restart the server, the same NPC that WAS moving, is now frozen in place. So I’m inclined to think the NPC’s are “frozen” at startup, but I need help un-freezing them.

        -  Thanks in advance
                    Sideways_8
